mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_banner ( FPart, FTitle, FPicture, FSummary, FKInfoID, FURL, FWeight, FStatus, FCreateTime, FKCreateBy, FUpdateTime, FKUpdateBy ) VALUES ( #{part}, #{title}, #{picture}, #{summary}, #{info.id}, #{url}, #{weight}, #{status}, NOW(), #{createBy.id}, NOW(), #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_banner b SET b.FPart = #{part}, b.FTitle = #{title}, b.FPicture = #{picture}, b.FSummary = #{summary}, b.FKInfoID = #{info.id}, b.FURL = #{url}, b.FWeight = #{weight}, b.FStatus = #{status}, b.FUpdateTime = NOW(), b.FKUpdateBy = #{updateBy.id} WHERE b.FID = #{id}
UPDATE t_banner b SET b.FViewedCount = b.FViewedCount + 1 WHERE b.FID = #{id}
UPDATE t_banner b SET b.FSharedCount = b.FSharedCount + 1 WHERE b.FID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.FID id, b.FPart part, b.FTitle title, b.FPicture picture, b.FSummary summary, i.FID "info.id", i.FTitle "info.title", b.FURL url, b.FWeight weight, b.FStatus status FROM t_banner b LEFT JOIN t_info i ON b.FKInfoID = i.FID WHERE b.FID = #{id}
SELECT b.FID id, b.FTitle title, b.FCreateTime createTime, b.FViewedCount viewedCount, b.FSharedCount sharedCount FROM t_banner b WHERE b.FPart = #{part} ORDER BY b.FViewedCount DESC
